title: Google Antigravity Platform Intelligence
summary: Comprehensive documentation and architectural teardown of Google Antigravity (v1.16.5). Includes full official documentation coverage: Home, Getting Started, Agent Capabilities (Models, Modes, Skills, Task Groups), Rules & Workflows, Security (Strict/Sandbox Mode), Artifacts & Knowledge, Editor/Manager Interfaces, and Browser Interaction. Specifically documents the 'Skills' deep dive, the 12,000 character limit for Rule files, and the behavioral protocol that concrete platform-base understanding is a prerequisite for project-wide prediction error minimization.
